HRClusterpath 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    From R matrix compute theta matrix

    build_theta.Rd

    From R matrix compute theta matrix

    build_theta(R, clusters)

    Arguments

    R

    a K x K matrix : the matrix of the clusters coefficients

    clusters

    a list of vector : each vector gives the element of a cluster.

    Value

    Return the theta matrix from the value of the R matrix of clusters coefficient using :

                           theta = U R U^t + A

    where U is the cluster matrix and a diagonal matrix such that the rows of theta sum to zero : a_ii = - sum_l p_l r_kl for i in cluster C_k.

    Examples

    
R <- matrix(c(1, 2,
              2, 5), nr = 2)
clusters <- list(c(1,2,3),c(4,5))
build_theta(R, clusters)
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4] [,5]
#> [1,]   -6    1    1    2    2
#> [2,]    1   -6    1    2    2
#> [3,]    1    1   -6    2    2
#> [4,]    2    2    2  -11    5
#> [5,]    2    2    2    5  -11
